structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Deeds; Notice Of Lease Or License; Recording; Contents

text.section: a statement that the instrument relates to a time-share and is subject to the provisions of this chapter;
a description of the time-share including designation of the unit or units, and the time-share property in which it is located;
the book, page and date of recording of all time-share instruments denominating, creating or regulating the time-share;
a statement of the use for which the time-share is intended and the restrictions, if any, on its use;
the time-share expense liability and any voting rights assigned to the time-share; and
any further provisions which the parties may deem desirable to set forth, consistent with the time-share instruments and the provisions of this chapter.
